Articles.Content: no haha, not the skybox, the literal sky from the surface of the planet. It's pitch black, and sometimes doesn't even register daytime when the sun is right above me, it looks like nighttime when it's like that.

> 
> > 
> > Improved wormhole (Coming soon): 
> > I got the mod but whenever I play it, the other star systems are missing
> 
> 
> Please pm me a copy of your gamedata folder, So i can see whats wrong.

> 
> No, KerbalGalaxy mod has not developed for OPM. Outer planets will rotate around Kerbol, but your spacecraft won't be able to come to these planets being at orbit of Kerbol.

Can you fix it then? If you do find a solution that puts all OPM's planets in Kerbol's SOI, then I can bring this into my modded YouTube series and do a mod spotlight on it.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Improved wormhole (Coming soon):

This. Is. Impossible. Please please keep working on it.

> 
> Can you fix it then?

No, I can't. I'm not developer of this mod. But you can set radius of Kerbol System at the Kopernicus/Configs/System.cfg.

    Kopernicus{    name = Kerbol System    Body    {        name = Sun        Template        {            name = Sun            removeProgressTree = false        }        Properties        {        geeASL = 1000000        radius = (set here)        description =

> 
> no haha, not the skybox, the literal sky from the surface of the planet. It's pitch black, and sometimes doesn't even register daytime when the sun is right above me, it looks like nighttime when it's like that.

I too have that problem. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> no haha, not the skybox, the literal sky from the surface of the planet. It's pitch black, and sometimes doesn't even register daytime when the sun is right above me, it looks like nighttime when it's like that.

This is a Kopernicus issue. Multiple star systems is not yet fully supported and so you have bugs like this happening. You'll have to wait for the Kopernicus guys to finish working out the bugs.

Guys i need some help with this mod.

I stupidly forgot to take pictures but the other solar systems dont appear for me and causes a stupid glitch where the stars and Kerbal daytime sky texture dissapears. A lot of people are having this problem but theres no installation guide. Thanks in advance.

I am using a computer with windows 7, the 64x install and 8GB of RAM so i doubt the problem is caused by memory issues.
I added this mod to the list of planet packs on [http://outer-planets.wikia.com/wiki/Planet_Packs](http://outer-planets.wikia.com/wiki/Planet_Packs)

Ok, let me see if I got it: this mod adds other solar systems with their own planets and moons, which we can travel to?

Artyomka15 you could improve the jump the wormhole hyperspace because it will not in gargantua system but in her orbit to 500 years away from the WHAT system is not very feasible for kerbal. And Artyomka15 u could pull this error
I take my hat off. Amazing pack.

A note about the skybox : It is somewhat empty. I know it is supposed to be a galaxy, but when you look at the size of this one, it is rather a small star cluster. I think it would render very nicely if it was near a galaxy (like on top of the Milky Way). This way the skybox would feel more full and detailed.

I've noticed that this month there was a new build of Kopernicus released. Is replacing the kopernicus plug in included in KG2 with the new build likely to resolve the bugs some of us have been having with KG2?

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> A note about the skybox : It is somewhat empty. I know it is supposed to be a galaxy, but when you look at the size of this one, it is rather a small star cluster. I think it would render very nicely if it was near a galaxy (like on top of the Milky Way). This way the skybox would feel more full and detailed.

I'd be satisfied if i could just get the extra explorable stars and planets to appear.

Install Distant object enhancements and make a config. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Artyomka will probably make one into the mod soon enough anyway (Please do it plz)
I got this mod to work, it seems the problem is that the download contains an outdated version of Kopernicus. I replaced it with the latest dll file of Kopernicus and its fine now.

This mod is pure awesome! I was getting a lot of memory shortage related crashes, but then I migrated to the surprisingly stable 64-bit version, now I can do anything I want!

Sent this exploratory vessel to the wonderful world of Nix. Five meters wide, at least the 10 kerbals had some decent interior space for 125 years. Nuclear is the only way to fly.

[![19670371092_6a890bcbfb_h.jpg](https://farm1.staticflickr.com/439/19670371092_6a890bcbfb_h.jpg)](https://flic.kr/p/vYcN2b)[screenshot2](https://flic.kr/p/vYcN2b)

wow! awesome wiki!

Ok, I have to say I love this mod somuch, but I dont wanna mix my current save with the one of KerbalGalaxy 2, so is there a way where I can have the classic universe and the KerbalGalaxy 2 universe. I hope you got an answer

it's fairly simple:

1. select KSP\_win folder (or whatever it's called on your machine

2. right click + copy

3. right click + paste somewhere else

4. install KerbalGalaxy 2 in your new KSP install

5. ???

6. PROFIT!
